title: Introduction
text:
Hi! My name is Barrett Buhler, and I am currently a first-year Masterâ€™s student at the University of Toronto, specializing in biostatistics. I am conducting research at SickKids in the Strug Lab under the guidance of Lisa Strug and Delnaz Roshandel. My academic interests are primarily centered around machine learning and its applications in healthcare.
Outside of work, I enjoy surfing, travelling and playing chess. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to me on Linkedin.
